reviews.title: Too bad
reviews.text: The worst service app in Thailand. You will end up seeing busy sign in app when you plan to hire their car/service. This app doesn’t even work in Bangkok and it is just useless service in Thailand.

reviews.title: Xử lý sự cố rất tệ
reviews.text: Cách xử lý của lalamove khi đơn hàng gặp vấn đề rất là tệ

reviews.title: 沒客服聯絡方式只能透過App，但App只顯示「錯誤」無法登入
reviews.text:
沒客服聯絡方式只能透過App，但App只顯示「錯誤」無法登入。
以前還有客服聯絡電話跟email，現在官網上完全查詢不到任何的聯絡方式，只提供給App用戶，但系統有問題嘗試多次無法登入下單。

reviews.title: Ugly app design but the delivery works
reviews.text: Whenever I have a choice I won’t use this app. Ugly design.

reviews.title: I DON’T MIND DOUBLEBOOKING BUT…
reviews.text: I wish you would tell the customer in advance if the waiting time would be longer than estimated. ☹️ It took an extra 2 hours just to get my item delivered. I would have liked to have a choice in that. Customer service is almost useless

reviews.title: Giao hàng cực lâu, txe chồng chành đòi tiền thêm, tự ý ghép chuyến
reviews.text: Cách làm việc không chuyên nghiệp, txe đòi tiền thêm, tự ý ghép đơn để trễ thời gian giao hàng, tự ý chuyển sang xe khách giao nhận rồi tự huỷ đơn, thông tin không chính xác gây mất thời gian và tâm lý mất an tâm

reviews.title: Available Anywhere, where? Incorrect positioning.
reviews.text: Better to state your markets upfront. It’s not available anywhere. I tried it in China and it didn’t work. It supposedly requires another app to use. Anywhere is contextual then. It makes sense to be upfront with clarity to the person downloading.

reviews.title: Promo notifications
reviews.text:
Receiving promo notifications even though I turned them off in the app. Supposed to be critical notifications for orders.

Had to revoke Lalamove notifications entirely as the app developer is rude.

reviews.title: Driver
reviews.text: They charge you extra and even you told to it to the costumer service they needto bring a  balance money to returned after purchase, and the driver had no money to change. (Alibi).

reviews.title: WARNING!!! Stolen packages!!!
reviews.text:
Be very careful if you’re using this service in the Philippines. A lot of packages are stolen, especially if you’re a foreigner. It happened with me and heard a lot of stories. You can’t do anything, they will not care and literally will ignore you.
Best if you will never try it!!!

reviews.title: tốt
reviews.text: tốt

reviews.title: Very slow app with inaccurate pricing
reviews.text: Just be aware that the English version doesn’t display correct pricing (they charge you more afterwards) and the map/tracking of the driver is never accurate. The drivers always come earlier than scheduled, too.

reviews.title: Motorista roubou mercadoria
reviews.text: Motorista parou a entrega por não ter recebido pedagio, nem sabia sobre ter ou não pedagio, não chegou a tempo e sumiu com o produto. Empresa com suporte de atendimento ruim, ainda está para resolver a situação.

reviews.title: It works
reviews.text: Nascent service, with room to improve.

reviews.title: Disgusting service
reviews.text: All of the stupid drivers and customer service. and I don’t recommend them to use it

reviews.title: Good service
reviews.text: Fast and good

reviews.title: Offensive App
reviews.text: It’s offensive when your app tells the client to pay any outstanding payments. Instead You SHOULD ACKNOWLEDGE PAYMENT.

reviews.title: 情況
reviews.text: 其實我時常都想反映、想找你們電單車司機是可以收和直接送去。但每次落單司機就說你送下來、否則我就走、路過！有時候真的沒有預計這個事情、怎樣找人特別走下去呢！兩邊我都明白、了解。老實說服務是這樣寫可以的、但是他們不想去做那怎樣呢？只是反映、不是投訴、希望你們做得更好，也謝謝有你們的幫忙🙏

reviews.title: 李法興司機實在太棒了！
reviews.text: 李司機總是非常細心，照顧到每次訂單，非常滿意

reviews.title: stop sending me spam text messages
reviews.text:
ever since i signed up for this app i keep receiving spam messages from LALAMOVE. there is no way to opt out and contacting them by email does not get replies. I waited 30 mins for customer live chat and was not connected to anyone. There is no way to delete your account either, so they’ll have my information until they go bust :/ 
Stop sending me text messages!!!

reviews.title: Ko định vị dc vị trí người gửi
reviews.text: Ko định vị dc vị trí người gửi. Dù ở đường lớn ở Hcm. Mới cài xong phải gỡ!

reviews.title: Lousy Lalamove, pls beware
reviews.text:
Poor availability as 80% of the time , there is no available service.  and in the few instances you get drivers, have experienced cancellations. 

very frustrating that I had to request to refund my deposit to wallet. the customer service chat is quick to reply however it also failed miserably because the said refund was for processing and even after 3 months it never happened and they did not even bother to reply to my messages after that. 

To this date, no one has reached out nor returned the funds.  Pls beware.

reviews.title: Chinese company stealing intellectual property
reviews.text: This is a Chinese company looking to steal intellectual property from US companies to support their global expansion 👎👎

reviews.title: Convenience at your fingertips
reviews.text: User friendly, real time and efficient. 👍🏼

reviews.title: Spam users stealing emails and customer service won’t fix
reviews.text: This app allows people to register your email falsely and won’t remove it from an account when your report fraud.

reviews.title: Notifications drive me nuts!!!
reviews.text: Too many!!! I dont care about them!!! Turn them off!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Annoying notifications
reviews.text: Try this app if you love getting beeped about promotions and offers. Not.

reviews.title: Renato L
reviews.text: Thanks for going above and beyond your duty.. Sa uulitin.. Kudos!! You deserve a 5 Star..😁😁😁😁

reviews.title: Recommended!
reviews.text: Driver came on time and was very helpful. Would like to commend Erickson Manzano for being nice and respectful. A must keep lalamove driver!Will definitely use the app again. Keep it up. 👍🏻😊

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.text: Apps is very useful with good services, good manner and punctual drivers.

reviews.title: Really great service
reviews.text: Needed to move some furniture from a friend's house. Called Lalamove, and the person I was matched with was really friendly and helpful! Would use again!!

reviews.title: I really like lalamove
reviews.text: never thought about writing a review before, but lalamove deserved this one. the driver was really nice and using the app was so smooth and easy, and a lot cheaper than other delivery services here in HK. wish u guys all the best
Good service with reasonable price.

reviews.title: You won't find a better local delivery service
reviews.text: You can try to find an alternative but Lalamove is the only real option when you need a delivery service that is fast, reliable, and cost effective.

reviews.title: What's the point of an App?
reviews.text:
In theory, an app is created so that one may automate and create a more seamless experience for the end user. Maybe save some time, possibly create a tool that's useful. This experience may come in the form of ordering a taxi, food for your meal or a rideshare car. 

Allegedly that's what lalamove tried to do. But while the App may look shiny and is considerably user friendly, it fails in all other aspects that may suggest a more automated or seamless experience. Some examples- why did I get 8 missed calls from their customer service after using their App? Why was I not able to resolve the issue after the 4 subsequent calls with their team? Why were there multiple drivers calling me? Why didn't the driver correct call me in the first place? Why was I negotiating with the driver til close to midnight on the phone? 

While training and basic customer service etiquette seemed utterly devoid from my interaction with the lalamove team, it seems the biggest shortfall is in how NOT streamlined the experience is. What should have been a 1 minute App experience turned into a combined 3 hour ordeal. I hope the lalamove team gets it and fixes their approach to their service, as well as reconsider the end users' journey post-click. It Best of luck.

reviews.title: Easiest van yet!
reviews.text: After little luck with various "man-with-a-van" services and lots of hassles with schedules and extra charges, this app was a breath of fresh air! The user interface works well and it is easy to select the options you need. The price is clear (as long as you don't go over the time or up stairs) and reasonable too. The best part is not being at the mercy of someone else's schedule! Thanks Easy Van!

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.text: Easy and efficient. Perfect if you have no car.

reviews.title: Don't bother
reviews.text: Too many variables in services available for this app to be effective. You order a pick up and a driver accepts it. You make arrangements. Driver then changes time. You reluctantly agree and adjust the arrangements. Driver shows up and wants to change price because the stars have not quite aligned for him...... Just call a guy out of the local classified and save some money and grief. Oh yeah, just try using the 'discount voucher' with the driver...... Good luck!

reviews.title: Good idea for service. Theres room to improve for the app and driver.
reviews.text: I like the convenience for having options like this service.

reviews.title: family stranded at the airport
reviews.text: Driver canceled at the assigned pick up time.  This is despite calling a half hour before the pick up to confirm the pick up.  I used this service to get a van because my family has too much luggage to fit in a taxi.  When the driver canceled my family was stranded.  This service is unreliable and their is obviously zero vetting of the drivers.  Avoid this app at all costs!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.text: Fast reply great service, great app!

reviews.title: Great solution!!
reviews.text: Excellent, fast service as very reasonable rates. Highly recommended especially if you need is delivery (no assembly)! Very pleased with this option and makes it easier when we have to shop at Ikea now.

reviews.title: A totally new level of convenience
reviews.text: Highly recommended. I don't speak Cantonese nor Mandarin. I used this app and I got a van in 10 minutes to move my stuff.

reviews.title: So easy and convenient. Must have app!
reviews.text: Download now!

reviews.title: Software great! Price unreliable.
reviews.text: The software is easy to use. The response from drivers is almost instantaneous. However, the price quoted in the app will be at minimum half of what drivers request even if you add a large tip.
